name: stencil-tailwind-plugin
description: This package is used to integration [tailwindcss](https://tailwindcss.com/) and (StencilJS)[https://stenciljs.com/]. This plugin for Stencil is specifically focused on the integration between tailwindcss in [JIT](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/just-in-time-mode#enabling-jit-mode) mode and the Stencil build. While tailwindcss can be integrated into a Stencil build, this plugin aims to ease the integration, while providing an optimised inclusion of styles across the shadow DOM.
author: Richard Shephard
